body:
Comment 2: 
I think all you need is this:

	const RFC822 = "02 Jan 06 1504 MST"

or

	const RFC822 = "02 Jan 06 1504 -0700"


Please let me know if that's not enough.  (You can try it yourself.)  The point of this
interface is not having to pre-define every 
format.

-rob
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
